posts.post_title: T209-2 Duvie and Rickard For Sale
posts.post_content:
I am selling the two below T209-2 duplicates, Duvie and Rickard. Both are in very poor condition with back damage and major paper loss.

I am asking $65 DLVD for the pair and will consider selling individually if there is any interest.

Thank you,

Zach Rice
[url]zdr55@gwmail.gwu.edu[/url]

I'll take them if still available.  E-mail sent!
